death.attack.helmet: %1$s should wear a helmet next time
minesafety.config.yLevel: The Y level at which you should wear a helmet.
minesafety.config.chance: The chance you get damaged this tick, in percent.
minesafety.config.timeout: The minimum time in seconds between 2 hits from this mod.
minesafety.config.message: The message displayed in-game when user takes damage from no helmet.
